name: Andrisoft
tag_list: network-traffic-monitoring, ddos-protection, ddos-mitigation, netflow, sflow-analyzer, sflow-collector
overview: Andrisoft is a company that, since 2006, develops traffic monitoring and DDoS mitigation software maintaining a strong business focus on implementation and support of applications needed in Network Operation Centers. Its main product is called WANGUARD and it provides IP traffic monitoring, analysis, accounting, reporting, traffic anomalies detection and DDoS protection. The last version, 5.0, was released on October 20, 2012 and it adds new major features like extensible traffic decoders, NetFlow v9, IPFIX and native sFlow support.
